title: Spandana Sphoorty Financial stops adding new-to-credit customers
description: Microfinance company Spandana Sphoorty Financial has halted acquiring new-to-credit customers and stopped onboarding new clients in 14% of its branches due to increased delinquencies and asset quality concerns.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
